Description:
Job Summary:Responsible for supporting Purchasing Activities through Searching and Analyzing all Potential Suppliers to insure excellent services.Purchasers monitor and maintain inventory levels, ordering new items as needed to keep the inventory fully stocked and supplied. Purchasers ensure that purchased orders are delivered by coordinating with warehouse and transport staff. Purchasers negotiate new contracts with existing and new vendors and suppliers. Responsibilities and Tasks:Explore new suppliers and work on sampling process.
Coordinate & follow up with suppliers.
Follow up for the payments.
Negotiate with suppliers,
Communicating with multiple suppliers and getting the best quote for all the required purchases.
PO creation upon management’s approval
Liaise with accounting department for payment processing.
Monitor & follow up on all the orders till delivery.
Keep searching for new suppliers for cost effectiveness.
Maintaining data of all the stocks on hand & new orders
Documenting progress of all the assigned tasks on daily basis until accomplished.
Any special task assigned by company. Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in Supply Chain our relevant field.
Excellent communication skills – reading and speaking both language (Arabic and English).
Negotiation Skills.
Fluent in Microsoft of office.
Presentation Skills.
Analytical Skills.
Administrative Skills.
